SRecProtocol.Server

Class ServerConnectionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • SRecProtocol.Server.ServerConnectionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    class ServerConnectionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Author:
    Jose Miguel Zamora Batista. SercerConnectionHandler is allways created by an Executor service located in ServerConnectionService class
    See Also:
    This class handles with a new client, receive his SRecMessageRequest request, process it and sent to client a SRecMessageResponse response., SRecMessageRequest, SRecMessageRequest

      Register a new client into ServerConnectionService list.
      void run()
      Start listening for a SRecMessageRequest message sent by the client and wait ( this block the thread until the message is read) and then process that request and send a new SRecMessageResponse response to the client.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Start listening for a SRecMessageRequest message sent by the client and wait ( this block the thread until the message is read) and then process that request and send a new SRecMessageResponse response to the client.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        See Also:
        SRecMessageRequest, SRecMessageResponse
